answers.answer: I havent experienced any swelling during my pregnancy yet but my sisters swelled up bad. Keep your feet elevated!
Not to scare you but it could be a sign of preeclampsia. I have a note on swelling in my journals you may check it.
You should call your doc and ask.   They may want to check your bp to rule out preeclampsia.

question: I don't see my doctor until next Friday but this past week my feet have been so swollen I do drink lots of water and nothing salty I was wondering if it's normal at 34 weeks?? It doesn't go away!
title: extreme swelling
